changeSet.author: Sreekalyan
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for Complications Form

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) From concept_reference_term where `code` in ("163793","125807","17311","158443","158855","114100","158443","141709","112406","140483","148203","125246") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = "CEIL" and retired =0 );

changeSet.comment: Adding codes to CEIL

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Anaesthetic complication in OT","Antibiotic adverse reaction","Anemia due to acute blood loss","Cardiac Arrhythmia","Heart Failure","Myocardial infarction, peri-operative","Stroke","Pulmonary Embolus","Deep Venous Thrombosis","Pneumonia, post-operative","Acute kidney injury","Surgical Site Infection","Cellulitis","Hematoma, surgical site","Skin graft failure","Flap necrosis","Stress ulcer","Nerve injury","Urological fistula","Recto-fistula","Bladder Injury","Ureter Injury","Bowel Injury","Unanticipated return to surgery within 3 days","Unanticipated return to surgery within 30 days","Death","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Patient complication");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Patient complication

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("No transfusion","Transfusion required") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Anemia due to acute blood loss, description");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Anemia due to acute blood loss, description

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Hypoxia","Severe nausea and vomiting","Hypotension","Spinal headache","Aspiration","Pneumonia","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Anaesthetic complication in OT, description");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Severe nausea and vomiting","Neutropenia","Thrombocytopenia","Rash","Febrile reaction","Acute kidney injury","Anaphylaxis","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Antibiotic adverse reaction, description");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Yes","No") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Any intervention(s) or surgeries prior to initial MSF surgery?");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Grade I - No treatment","Grade II - Requiring drug treatment","Grade IIIa - Interventions with local anaesthesia","Grade IIIb - Interventions under general anaesthesia","Grade IVa - Single-organ dysfunction","Grade IVb - Multi-organ dysfunction","Grade V - Death of patient") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CM, Grade of complication");
